security: Sharing details about the PERSIST Group and associated individuals could reveal intelligence sources and methods, potentially endangering ongoing operations or compromising the safety of individuals involved. Quoting directly: “This report, is the latest informatica available en Pujost Essistanse Group and may be passed to the [LST]”.
summary: A report regarding information on the [Lexson Lev]-PERSIST Group in Bavaria is being sent under separate cover, as requested in Reference HW 8307.
summary_one_paragraph: This document indicates that a report containing the latest available information on the [Lexson Lev]-PERSIST Group in Bavaria is being dispatched under separate cover, as per request HW 8307 dated August 13, 1963. The report, marked for background use only and not for reproduction, may be passed to the [LST]. Distribution includes various CIA units, including RI, X/8/8, RAB/KP, and C/2/9/9.
title: [Lexson Lev]- PERSIST Group in Bavaria
recipient: Chief of Base, Munich; Chief of Station, Germany
